Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Your clients participated in our homeowner surveys and scored you highly on criteria related to the service you provide. You are a candidate for the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c} award.
Action required: In order to be considered for the award, you must complete an online evaluation form - candidates must satisfy minimum experience and production criteria. Complete the secure, online form in minutes by going to {!Opportunity.Research_Form_URL__c}: The deadline for submission is {!Opportunity.CloseDate}.
If you are selected as an award winner, you will be published in a special section in the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} issue of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}. There is no cost to be considered or awarded and fewer than 7% of the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}s in your area will be selected.
